blocks.subject: Re: Recommendation of outside counsel
text: We use two firms for U.S. derivatives advice - both in New York and both
David Mitchell of Cadwalader, Wickersham & Taft (212)504-6285
David we use for contract issues - what should our forms look like under
various conditions, etc. and Ken, who is a former General Counsel of the
CFTC, we use for policy questions, political (lobbying) and e-commerce issues.

blocks.subject: Recommendation of outside counsel
text: As Portland General Electric Company prepares for its sale to Sierra Pacific
Resources later this year, we are reassessing how we deploy our legal
resources.  To that end, we most likely will be in need of outside counsel to
assist us with ISDA issues.  Is there a firm, or an individual that you could
